sections.title: About
sections.content: Self-taught front-end developer with 3+ years of experience in creating responsive, visually appealing, and user-friendly web applications. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JS, React, and other web development tools. Skilled at implementing design concepts into pixel-perfect and responsive user interfaces. Seeking an opportunity to develop my skills and abilities.

items.title: FullstacksJS
items.description: An open-source community focused on knowledge sharing, exploring, and enhancing developer experience
